questions.text: Who was drunk the night before?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	Norm toyed with Frasier, telling him that Frasier insulted a man last night and the man was coming back to beat him up. When Frasier asked why Norm was toying with him, Norm said that it was a great cure for a hangover. Frasier said it didn't help. Norm replied, "But mine's gone completely."

questions.text: Who had a crush on Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Sam told him he had that "dopey look". Woody said that the last few months he had noticed Rebecca.

questions.text: What did Woody think a home-run was?
questions.explanation:
a kiss.

	A home run when dealing with dating is having sex. However Woody was naive so he thought it was just a kiss, which by the others would be considered first base.

Sam and Woody.

	Carla was the witness of the kiss. The kiss had to be on the mouth for a full three counts.

questions.text: What would the loser of the kiss-off get?
questions.explanation:
a kiss from Norm.

	Norm said that there would be no losers then. The choice a free beer would not have worked because Sam could not have alcohol, since he was a recovering alcoholic.

questions.text: Which characters were in the scene in the play Woody was practicing with Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
Beau and Cherie.

	Woody told Rebecca he was trying out for "Bus Station". Rebecca corrected him and told him it's "Bus Stop". Woody was discouraged and said that he'd never get the part. "Bus Stop" was written by William Inge.

questions.text: What did Norm say he had done once or twice?
questions.explanation:
perspired.

	Carla replied, "We can grow rice." Norm, being a heavy set man, probably perspired more than the average person.

questions.text: Who told Rebecca what was going on with the kiss-off?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Rebecca promised Carla a paid day off if she told her. She then offered to help Rebecca get back at the two men.

questions.text: What happened when the two men tried to kiss Rebecca in the end?
questions.explanation:
They kissed each other.

	Rebecca had Woody pretend he was asleep on the couch. She also had Sam pretend to come and wake her up from the couch with a kiss. So the two ended up kissing each other.

questions.text: What question did Woody ask Sam?
options: how he and Sam could fall for a trick like that
questions.explanation:
how his kissing was.

	Woody said he couldn't ask women that question. Sam told Woody to shut up because he didn't want to discuss having kissed a guy with anyone, including that guy.
